title: The purest petrolhead movie
review:
A great story being transferred to the big screen, it was inevitable that the facts would be a bit dramatized but nonetheless an awesome way to show how great Ken Miles was.
The movie can be also watched by the ones not familiar with the story.

title: Divided
review:
This movie divides me the most, it's not just a superhero movie in fact it's stronger points are the the performance from Phoenix and the social message it delivers. Just imagine how closer people like that live around us...
Nonetheless it's a piece of cinema history, not an enjoyable movie, a great movie.
